roleset.name: caused to be unable to see

role.descr: blind to what? specific thing arg1 cannot see

example.name: Within CXN
example.text: Clearly you are too blinded by your personal selfishness and greed to see and feel the rain falling on your head from your Tea Party overlords.
example.arg: [too] , [to see and feel the rain falling on your head from your Tea Party overlords]
by your personal selfishness and greed

example.name: All args
example.text: He was blinded to the law by his own obsessions.

roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2, 3.
